name: Watch Wizard
description:
A Fitbit game made for Ludum Dare 51, ported to HTML5 for convenience.

Note: Only tank controls available in HTML5.
Mobile-friendly port with tilt controls hopefully coming soon, no promises.

Current HTML5 Version: 0.5.2

Fitbit Gallery Page: https://gallery.fitbit.com/details/4cff4901-0288-48ee-93de-39db8016e30a
Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/watch-wizard-fitbit-sense-versa-3

This first version of the HTML5 port only works properly in computer browsers and has only been tested in Chrome. Let me know if you have issues in other browsers.

(The arm frame is a slime's arm, but I am bad at art. If you want to fix it for me, let me know.)
